CustomField.description: Populating this setting will automatically create a Contact Role for Opportunities with a notification recipient Contact. Leaving this field blank will disable automatic Contact Role creation for the notification recipient.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Populating this setting will auto-create a contact role for opportunities with a notification recipient contact. Leaving this field blank will disable automatic contact role creation for the notification recipient.
CustomField.label: Notification Recipient Opp Contact Role
